website_summaries.verdict: Cats will never be bored when they're spending time in this multi-level pet playpen.
pros: Uses hammocks and platforms that lock into the sides of the playpen to give cats areas for climbing and jumping
Aluminum playpen construction weighs less than you'd think
cons: Made for cats and doesn't really work as well for dogs

customer_reviews.title: I think it's great. I wanted something I could put outside on ...
customer_reviews.text: I think it's great. I wanted something I could put outside on my deck so my kitty could enjoy the outdoors without escaping into the woods. It wasn't hard to put together and I was satisfied with the quality. The cat hates it.
customer_reviews.author: Lainey Larkin

customer_reviews.title: Good cage - Design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Good product; 2 day delivery; good packaging (pictured) PROS •Easy, 1-person assembly •Seemingly sturdy •Kitten took to it easily •Roomy CONS •Design flaw that prevents top door from opening all the way - see video/pics •Bottom tray doesn’t lift or slide out for easy cleaning Other people complained about the styrofoam - I just vacuumed each piece as I unpacked it. It was easy and didn’t take a lot of extra time. Other people complained about the wheels. Mine rolled fine across hardwood and carpet (keep in mind I ordered the Deluxe).
customer_reviews.author: Llyzaard

customer_reviews.title: It is a badly engineered piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had not bought this. After an hour and a half my friend and I gave up trying to fit the roof so that we could use the supposedly and purportedly "press in" connecters, absolutely necessary to hold this ill-fitting badly made piece of crap together. even a hammer will not "press" them in. My roof is an inch small all over . . . There is no hammock, either. If I can stand to try to get it apart (broken if necessary, I am returning it and I will NEVER EVER buy anything from this company agoian.
customer_reviews.author: Linda J. Holland-Toll

customer_reviews.title: Nice protection for cats
customer_reviews.text: We have been using it for a couple of weeks. Just as advertised. Easy to assemble. I would buy again. One drawback is that it does vibrate or shake when a cat jumps inside. I would welcome advice as how to stabilize it further. We did not install the lockable wheels. Time and patience is required for the cats to accept using it. We are using it outside on a patio where the doors are left open, providing an escape and shelter. Our cats do not like the slings. We are using them as padding on the platforms.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prevue Pet 7500 Premium Cat Home - Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. It was easy to put together. It is large and sturdy. I do animal rescue and the kitty I put in it is a large kitty. The kennel was perfect. The three doors makes it easy to get things in and out of. I will use it when I take in mama kitties and their kittens....it will work good as the spaces between the bars is small. I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for foster setup. Doesn't take up much floor space. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent size for small foster kittens. This was very easy to put together, it's very sturdy. No sharp edges, no wobble if assembled correctly. I will be ordering an extra shelf to put up at the top. Hammock is a good size for kittens, they seem to enjoy it. Plenty of room for a smaller litter box, small scratcher and small bed along with bowls on the bottom. Not much else will fit down there. I would like to find perch covers in a fleece material if anyone knows where I can find that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent modular rescue cage
customer_reviews.text: Very well engineered rescue cage. We were capturing from three different litters of feral cats, and were able to add levels in this cage, as we added more kitten rescues. We now have seven kittens in the cage, that we're fostering and waiting for adoption. The multiple levels give them all space, and they love the hammocks to sleep in. The cage clips onto the base, and lifts off very easily when a more involved cleaning is necessary. Each level has it's own doorway, which makes it simpler to round up and replace the kittens in the cage after their exercise... Very simple to assemble, and easy to disassemble if fewer levels are required. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Confounded Consumer

customer_reviews.title: We purchased this product because we will be doing construction ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product because we will be doing construction on our home and will have to have the cats in the garage or outside depending on the weather. We wanted to build a catery, but were running out of time. It is large enough for two adult cats. The only negative are the hammocks. My cats are freaked out by them. I wish that there was an option to purchase more solid shelves. As you can see may large (20lbs) cat it quite comfy on the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Dumont

customer_reviews.title: Sophie Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: We adopted a 4 month old kitty and wanted something safe for her to be in when we were not home, while she was still get use to us and her new home. Very well made. Easy to put together (w/ two people) and Sophie loves it. If we leave the bottom door open she will even go in there on her own just to sleep. It really has come in handy for us, and this purchase was definitely worth it! ...As someone else mentioned in these reviews, I too wish it had a sliding tray on the bottom. It's kind of a pain to clean the bottom, but I started using a towel, which make cleanup easier.
customer_reviews.author: John Mi'bo

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit well, Bent Pieces, terrible instructions
customer_reviews.text: Pieces came bent. The d*** pieces just wouldn't fit together. And then to top the collosal amount of aggravation this induces, the instructions are absolutely horrid. Yeah I hate it. First of all the thing wouldn't fit then finally after repairing bent pieces with pliers, when we finally got it to all fit, we realized the instructions were so meaningless that one of the main bottom pieces was put wrongly thus having us dismantle the whole thing and put it back. And guess what the bent pieces make it almost impossible for this to get dismantled now. Save yourself the aggravation and steer clear of this garbage product
customer_reviews.author: TribalTech

customer_reviews.title: Expert Catio
customer_reviews.text: Was able to modify it a little for the ultimate catio. I love that it has three entrances. We removed the door from the middle entrance and turned that one to face the house so the cats could come in and out that way and turned the other two (top and bottom) entrances so we could get in and out to do whatever clean add water food etc. Love love love this enclosure. It was perfect for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Gilchrist

customer_reviews.title: Horrible packaging, inaccurate description of contents, product bent
customer_reviews.text: Took me about 30 minutes of sweating just to get this out of the box, there was way too much styrofoam which had partly disintegrated into tiny pieces all over the contents, one of the cage pieces was bent and the castors are supposed to have on/off catches to stop it rolling, but in reality they don't. That's as far as I have got. Probably the worst packaging I have ever had to deal with. I'm very disappointed and annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Patience

customer_reviews.title: Safety problem with this product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this catio as a place to safely put my cats when we had company and/or to use on the back patio without anyone escaping. However a small incident happened at my house and one of my cats became so afraid he was actually able to get half of his head through the sides. He is only About a 7 pound cat. Then when I tried to roll him into the other room all of the wheels fell off. The wheels aren’t worth a crap. And if there’s a chance your cat could become spooked while in this there’s a good chance he or she will escape.
customer_reviews.author: Ma

customer_reviews.title: I and my cats love this. I just wheel it out in spring/summer/fall ...
customer_reviews.text: I and my cats love this. I just wheel it out in spring/summer/fall and my inside cats get to sit out on the deck safely and enjoy the sun, birds, and squirrels! Then just wheel it back in the garage again. Gives my cats fresh air and an adventure safely. Easy to put together and a nice solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Love the 3 tiers but cleaning can be a challenge if you have a litterbox inside.
customer_reviews.text: Great kitten pen but cleaning cat litter out of the crevices around the base is impossible. You have to take the whole cage off the base. Very inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Adelle

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, and fairly simple to put together
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge, sturdy, and fairly simple to put together. I spent a bit of time organizing mine, and the only things I found really challenging we're trying to put the wheels on (which I couldn't), and getting the pieces out of the box. I got this to house a new kitten in my apartment, but If you look at my picture you'll see that my two Chihuahuas, who are about 5 and 7 pounds each, are also enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Matson

customer_reviews.title: Prevue Pet Products 7501 Deluxe Cat Home with 3
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! It came on time securely packaged. It was easily assembled by myself with no help. I purchased it for my cat as an overnight bed because she likes to start playing about midnight and keeps everyone in the house awake. This cage is big enough for a litter box, toys, food and water bowls and the sleeping platforms that come with it. My cat easily adjusted to it with no fuss and now I find her sleeping in it during the day as I leave the doors open only closing them at night. There were no damaged or missing pieces and I would recommend this cage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this get away space. It’s his home away from home from the other animals where he feels safe and secure. It’s roomy and sturdy. It only took me (by myself) 30 minutes to put together. Easy set up and easy clean up. I recommend this product for pet lovers that have a cat with behavioral (pooping and peeing where they arent supposed to) problems. Having him in there while eating ensures he will poop and pee in there and feel comfortable about it. His life and ours has changed for the better. He’s only in there for 1-2 hours a day to eat. Love love love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer P.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, and the instructions were pretty self explanatory
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why so many people had difficulty putting this together? Well made, Sturdy, and the instructions were pretty self explanatory. Illustrations were good too. This is the perfect cage for our kitten to be placed in at night. We have an older cat and I'm not comfortable leaving them roaming at night in the house together yet. Don't want to risk him getting hurt. We can make sure he is safe when we are away from the home as well. Plenty of room for a litter box, food and water bowls. He has everything he needs to make him comfortable. Definitely was worth getting.
customer_reviews.author: L. Muraco

customer_reviews.title: Great cage for our 2 cats!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up! It's perfect out on our patio and the cats love it! 😸
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty good - but a couple of challenges
customer_reviews.text: This cage is great for fostering. It's better than just a standard kennel with no where to jump. However, when the shelves are on, you cannot open the doors all the way - this makes it hard to get in there to clean. Also, you have to take the metal part completely off of the base to get to food and litter that gets in the groove around the base's perimeter. I still use it - I just wish it was a little more functional. The animals seem to love the hammock. I also like that I can take out the shelves when the kittens are little.
customer_reviews.author: TRM

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS!  My poor little kitty cat got his paw stuck in between the wires in the cage :(
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of the cage, BUT be very careful!! My poor little kitty cat got his paw stuck in the wire and cried his eyes out until I could free him. It took me about 30 seconds, and his paw was swollen and sore. He is now a little afraid to go inside. I would recommend to the the manufacturer to make this item safer for cats. I would be very sad if someone's animal died from this happening to them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not enough levels for climbing this high. Tray doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Not enough levels for climbing this high. Tray doesn't remove for cleaning. Save your money and buy the three tier with removable tray.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good amount of room for one or two cats for a day or two of safety.
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable amount of room for one or two cats for a day of safety. We connected a large dog kennel to the side with the doors so the cats could have a separate area for the litter box. Our kitten loves the hammocks. The hammocks may not be sturdy enough for a heavier cat. A little challenging to put together mainly because is very important to get each side angled correctly so that it connected with each of the other pieces correctly. It was possible to put the pieces together incorrectly only to discover 2/3 of the way through the project that you had to take it apart and start over again.
customer_reviews.author: manaia2tanda

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: It is as advertised. We are going to try and use it as a catio. We purchased a vinyl window inset with locking cat door and plan to attach to cage to our house on our front porch. We will cover the cat cage with chicken cage wire too for protection. Temporary until we get one built. Our Bengal loves to get outside and get a closer look at the squirrels and birds in our yard so she uses the middle shelf to hide behind bushes in stealth or up top to get a birds-eye view of our front yard. Check the size to make sure you understand what size the cage is, it’s perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: PDXRosefan

customer_reviews.title: Went up easily
customer_reviews.text: Liked it all. I have lots and lots of experience with dog crates/cages (showing dogs through several family generations). Used these cages for three rescue cats (two in one as they are besties and one in another). Cages went up easy, no issues whatsoever. They look great, cats got used to them in less than a day. Easy to get in and out, clean etc. Only con would be a preference for a bit heavier duty wire - don't get me wrong, these are fine for our 8 pound cats. A bit expensive but for a few bucks more I figure the quality is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Delicata

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cage for Foster Cats
customer_reviews.text: I currently have a feral mom with kittens that I am fostering. This is the perfect size for them to nurse, grow and play, and the platforms allow some free time away from the kittens for mom. Plenty of room for a small or medium sized litterbox. Took me about 20 minutes to put together by myself. I love the covers of the platforms are tacked down because the kittens do like to pull on the edges and play with them. At some point I'm sure I'll have to replace the cover, but that's expected when you have adorable, rambunctious kitties. It is sturdy, and compared to the previous cage I had, definitely will have a good lifespan.
customer_reviews.author: NSGirl

customer_reviews.title: She loves to jump and has a lot of fun in her cage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cage for my little rascal of a kitten. She loves to jump and has a lot of fun in her cage. I use it only when I'm away, so the bottom doors are always open. She has her food and water on a top shelf and loves to jump to get it. I bought 2 extra shelves as the hammock are too flimsy. One negative: instructions. Not very clear. The parts are almost identical but different parts need to be on the bottom than ones in the middle; and the ones in the middle are different from the top. I was half way through assembly before I realized that my bottom parts were actually my top parts.
customer_reviews.author: marsh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outdoor catio use!
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a catio for outside of my window, what I ended up doing was taking my window out and replacing it with a plexi glass window with a cat door cut into it. Once that was done I put this catio on top of a small fold out table and had a cat tree in my room for the cats to get in and out. I did have to take the back door off the catio (there's front a back) for them to come out of the cat door in the window easily but other than that it's amazing. I put their litterbox at the bottom and it's really durable!
customer_reviews.author: Geek Out Reviews

customer_reviews.title: It is really a good environment for a cat.
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves the pen. She broke both elbows jumping out of a tree, we believe. She needed exercise in a confined space. Climbing among the three tiers is increasing her extension. I will always keep her in it at night and when we are away. She took about three weeks but now she sleeps in the hammocks. She uses every part of it.. We built a ramp to the floor because jumping down hurts her inhured arms.. I sweep the pen with a broom and pick up the sweepings with a small dustpan. I have also mopped it. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kaykay

customer_reviews.title: Non existent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I know probably every situation is different but my first point here is the customer service on this product from the company is non existent. The bottom floor part is cracked in mine. I’ve contacted the company twice now and haven’t received anything back. It’s important because now if anything spills then just leaks right the floor through the crack. The felt pads on the shelves and the hammocks are totally useless. My cats don’t use the hammocks and if your cat has even remotely long hair, it sticks to it like glue. I just removed both pieces. Other than that it works well. My cats actually go in there by themselves.
customer_reviews.author: John Parry Jr

customer_reviews.title: overall its a good size for the price
customer_reviews.text: we bought this for our ferrets. I wish it would have came with more ladders or something for them to get to the other hammocks but I know its meant for bigger animals... so we had to rig some up ourselves. also on the corners the bars are little further apart so they can squeeze out. we also had to rig something for that too. overall its a good size for the price!
customer_reviews.author: paige

customer_reviews.title: Damaged😿
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this, but it arrived damaged. The bars are bent & broken, causing the cage not to go together correctly. I really needed to use this for quarantine for a stray cat until he can be vetted. We had to customize it just so we can use it for now. It may have been damaged in shipping, im not sure, the box also had 2 large holes in it. For the money, I would have liked to have had a new cage, rather than one we had to customize just to be able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Catmom

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: We were going to add two kittens to our house and we wanted a safe and secure place for them.. My wife found this kennel for a reasonable price. I assembled it easily ( I do read instructions). It is well made with clever reinforcements. The kittens enjoy it with plenty of space for food ,water, bed, and a litter box plus a sling bed. The gal we adopted the kittens from came over to do some paper work and she immediately started asking about it, wanting to know where we bought it etc. This is a woman who runs a cat adoption service so she knows kennels. She was very impressed with the size , construction, and cost.
customer_reviews.author: armenious

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to write a bad review because of the packing
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to write a bad review because of the packing.. There was little pieces of the styrofoam EVERYWHERE.. I was really upset because it got all over BUT the crate itself and the shelves were AWESOMEwas it was WELL WORTH THE MESS!!! Awesome product but the packaging could use a litte work.. Would DEFINITELY get it again!! Great cage!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy L

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tower. It went together easily and is very sturdy. You get what you pay for. It far exceeds the $97 tower I also have. I have ordered extra shelves so I can make an upper level and will still have the double lower level which is plenty of room for my foster kittens. Cons: The wheels are a joke. They look really nice but the wheel is too small for the locking mechanism and the design of it catches in the loops of the rug and pull it out as you try to roll it. If the wheels were large so the locking mechanism didn't drag the ground I would have no negatives.
customer_reviews.author: alew

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe we found this at such a great deal. I didn't even know they existed other ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe we found this at such a great deal. I didn't even know they existed other than in pet stores. My mom has 2 cats and the one is dominant. He takes over and assumes ownership of everything. Well we gave this to the other can and don't let mr. big boss in it. The cat loves it and goes in there voluntarily. We keep the doors closed so that the other cat doesn't get in there and put his scent on it. It was super easy to put together and is great quality.
customer_reviews.author: CJmom

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy shelves for klutzy climbers
customer_reviews.text: I am hoping to get to 0 population so am trapping kittens and holding until I can spay or neuter. The kittens can play, wrestle and jump from shelves to hammock. They fall sometimes but are pretty adept because of sturdiness and nonslip surface. I am returning the less expensive three tier cage because the trays aren’t affixed. By the time you find a way to attach trays and buy hammock and non skid pads the cost and time is greater. I am getting a second cage! I recommend this product for the feisty kitten crew
customer_reviews.author: LFrances

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever. I have two cats and they are used to being crated at bedtime. Now they have plenty of room to street and hang out. It took a time for them to trust the hammocks..but at least one of them now likes to lounge on it. I added thick & soft blankets for the platforms, and they love it even more now. This was SUPER EASY to put together and required NO TOOLS at all. Just follow the steps in order, take your time and adjust everything before the final snaps into place and it will be fine. I love that there are wheels....so much easier to move when I'm cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Nena

customer_reviews.title: Our new kitten just loves it. The no pinch ...
customer_reviews.text: Our new kitten just loves it. The no pinch point was important to us. We even ordered extra shelves and hammocks from the manufacture. One draw back is if you put the shelves in certain areas you cannot swing that one side of the door open past 98degrees or so. The shelf need a slot cut into one clip to eliminate this problem, we are just dealing with it but it's all I could see them changing. Other than that he sleeps in it every night without a fuss and is safe from our other animals until he is big enough to be free all the time.
customer_reviews.author: ramiusxxx

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price but delivered with some flaws
customer_reviews.text: Cage is very easy to install and extremely functional. The package that held the cage parts was delivered in kind of rough condition so it was received with flaws (bent areas of wire and a couple areas where the base was noticeably chipped). We needed the cage so we didn't chose to return and reorder since it was functional. We instead reached out to the seller for a replacement base, but got no reply. That was the only disappointment with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BohoBeadMomma

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We used this "kitty condo" (as we like to call it) to contain our three full sized cats while we were having floors refinished and carpet installed. We also used it during showings while we were trying to sell our house. I would say that it is a little small for three cats and I probably should have bought the larger one, but this one was very easy to put together and it has totally served its purpose. The cats will be safe and secure in their kitty condo when we are loading the truck to move to our new house! It was a worthy purchase for us.
customer_reviews.author: skad

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Improvements to consider: Doors cannot completely open on the top two levels when hammock and platform are installed on the left as pictured. A removable inset on the bottom would be nice. Also, the possibility of connectors that would allow multiple of the products to be attached together to make it larger. Otherwise wise it's been working well for my semi feral Kitty. He has climbed and jumped all over it and it remains sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Cats love! Bigger than I thought! The kennel is Sturdy, good size, the platforms are sturdy, & the hammocks are good quality. My Cats haven’t really taken to the hammocks, but they will support a heavy cat. I gave it 4 stars because while it did come in on the delivery date, the box literally looked like it fell off of the delivery truck multiple times, the diagrams in the manual were difficult to read, & the base of the kennel was cracked when it arrived. P.s: When you open the box, have a vacuum on hand- Styrofoam will go everywhere as soon as you open the box. Lol! Still worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well for cats
customer_reviews.text: I foster cats for local animal shelter so this is very useful and looks good. It was relatively easy to assemble. It has casters so you can change location as needed, and the casters have a locking mechanism. I did have a caster that, when locked, would scratch my floor, but received a new one quickly when called company. It has a hammock that the little kittens can get to, but the shelves are too high for them. When I have adult cats, they will appreciate the higher shelves. .
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: The clips on hammock are not sturdy and broke almost immediately after purchase.
customer_reviews.text: While I absolutely love the cage for our new kitten. I’m giving this a 1 star because of a couple things. 1.The cage did not come with wheels that were suppose to be included in the purchase. Without the wheels it makes it difficult to move the cage. 2. Cage came with two hammocks. Less than 3 days after putting the hammocks up the clips broke on one of them. The second hammock, the clips broke on that one this week. This is a bummer as the kitten loves sleeping and playing on the hammock.
customer_reviews.author: Tph

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this cat cage. Running a cat rescue me and needing to separate kitties or put them in pet stores. This cage is spacious and has very sturdy shelves that are very wide compared with most cages. Easy to put together too. The ONLY reasons I give this 4 stars is the material on the shelves is very thin and was ruined in less than 1 month of use at a pet store and thr hammock also breaks where it connects to the cage. However, these things are minor compared to the quality of the cage!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Tailz Cat Rescue, Inc

customer_reviews.title: Very well built product
customer_reviews.text: I am pleasantly surprised with the quality of this pet cage. It was a bit tricky to put together, just read the directions carefully. there are specific panels for specific areas of the cage based upon how the cage fits together and how it fits to the base. Also, big tip: slide the connector pieces down onto the panels , do not try to just clip them on from the side. It will save frustration as trying to clip them into place is an exercise in futility. Cage is of a decent size for a kitten/small cat.
customer_reviews.author: C. S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Build and Durable
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our two indoor cats so they can get some fresh air and sunlight. Overall it was easy to install, it's durable and large enough for our liking. Would defnitley recommend. The ONLY downside is all of the small foam pieces within the packing. I had read reviews about that and proactively opened it in a space where I could easily clean it up. Aside from that, a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Darrin Matthews

customer_reviews.title: The 2 sets of wide double doors makes cleaning the cat box easy. Also feeding and changing the water dish is ...
customer_reviews.text: The cage was a pain to put together but, worth it. It is a little longer then the standard ones with wider shelves too. The 2 sets of wide double doors makes cleaning the cat box easy. Also feeding and changing the water dish is easier. The shelves are more comfortable too with the felt type pad attached to them. I have a sick kitty who needs to be confined until he recovers. I have a large cat box in the bottom and there is plenty of room If I wanted to add a second one I could easily. Not that I would only that I could. Its worth the extra $29
customer_reviews.author: Ann Dubinko

customer_reviews.title: Cat likes it
customer_reviews.text: Our house cat wants to go outside but I cannot let him out for his own safety. We have rolled this unit onto our back patio in the shade so kitty can enjoy the great outdoors! It was a little work to put this cage together but it is attractive and works well for our kitty when he wants to sit outside for an hour. Too bad it didn't fold up easily because we would take it with us in our RV if it did.
customer_reviews.author: AZironbutt

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My cat will destroy my home when we aren't here to watch her and since my home is small locking her in a room with food, litter box and toys just wouldn't work. This is a life saver, so when we can't supervise her she goes in here. It gives her room for everything she needs and she actually likes it. There are times when she is free to roam and would rather be in here. Great quality, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Slr

customer_reviews.title: Nice cage
customer_reviews.text: This cage definitely needs two people to assemble it. Also, some of the printed instructions weren't very clear. I wish they had included more sturdy platforms and/or sling platforms, as little kittens can't reach from one to the next. Because of the design of the cage's doors, it's difficult to place the platforms in many positions. In some positions, one can't open the doors anymore. Overall, though, it's not a bad cage.
customer_reviews.author: athas17

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: Really like this cage. I got it for our two newest members of our household until they can be trusted to be left out unsupervised. It's not too big not too small. Yes as the other reviewers have mentioned the top left door won't open all the way with the shelf was positioned and idk about the wheels because we didn't use them. But regardless of those two things this is a very nice inexpensive cage. It fits my top door litter box with no problems. I'm pretty satisfied with my purchase for now... we will just have to see how well it withstands time.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging. Open box item instead of new item.
customer_reviews.text: The product came in very damaged. Metal was so bent in some corners, I had to force fit then. For the price I paid, it is absolutely unacceptable. It looked like I got an open box item as opposed to brand new. Which is what I paid for. The only reason why I didn't return it is because I didn't have time to do so. I need it right Now. I will remember this very poor and disappointed experience.
customer_reviews.author: lgl

customer_reviews.title: Worth the effort to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this before I brought my adopted twins home because I don't like the idea of sequestering pets in a single room. Tigger and Roo are in my dining room close to a window and exposed to the sights and sounds of the house. Their in it while I'm at work and over night until I can trust them to be out and alone during the day. Their "house" is easy to move (on bare floors), sturdy and easy to clean. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kennel for rescue kittens
customer_reviews.text: This thing seems much larger in person than when I measured it out. I got it for some rescue kittens I'm fostering. It's perfect for them with lots of room for essentials & playing. It took me maybe 30 minutes to put together. Pretty easy. The wheels work great, unlike some other reviews I had seen. I think they changed the wheel design or something. Seems very sturdy. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: nervrek

customer_reviews.title: It was relatively easy to assemble took about 1 to 1/2 hours
customer_reviews.text: It was relatively easy to assemble took about 1 to 1/2 hours. Do wish it cam with ladders for the levels. My cat climbs up the sides to get up and jumps to get down. She is a smaller cat so this works well for her she is only about 6 pounds. I think a larger cat would not fair as well in this enclosure. But she does like it and it allows me to put her outside for fresh air and not worry something will happen to her. I would recommend this for someone with a small cat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent enclosure for cats who need to be separated from ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent enclosure for cats who need to be separated from others and/or confined. The packaging left a LOT to be desired though. It is packaged with more than enough styrofoam that was broken into tiny pieces all over the inside of the box and the cage. The cage had to be completely cleaned before it could even be brought inside (thank goodness we didn't open it inside!) While putting it together we found several areas of the cage that were bent and made assembly difficult. Over all, it's an excellent cage ... but beware of the packaging!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Fout

customer_reviews.title: Cool design and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Such a cool design. Easy to put together. No tools needed. There was a little damage to the underside of the base, but nothing effecting it's structure or effectiveness. One of our cats was in it with in minutes of setting it up. We have 3 cats the other two are not so sure yet. We are hoping to get 3 of them and hook them together with cat tunnels for an outside kitty area.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Preview Deluxe Pet Cage
customer_reviews.text: I put this together myself fairly quick & easy. I was using it for my elderly cat who has potty issues. It was sturdy & easy to move to different locations. I can not give a long term review because I am no longer using it....I couldn't stand my cats heartbreaking meowing. But for the most part... easy to assemble, sturdy & a good size with the 2 shelves & plenty of space on ther bottom for a litter box & food bowls. I did not use thre hammock. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lora

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding kennel for a cat. I cannot put ANYTHING together; always have to call my daughter to help. I read the easy-to-follow instructions and it took about 30-45 minutes MAX. This was probably the only large piece of furniture/equipment I have ever purchased that didn't have some kind of hangup about it when putting it together. Went together everywhere well and cat was in love with it instantly.
customer_reviews.author: ddhaber22

customer_reviews.title: It does it's job and it's durable.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for nearly a year now and it's perfect for my cats. It's rather pricey but they all are. This provides the height I wanted for my cats. Three hammock and platform pads didn't last long though. The hammock clips broke from all the jumping on and off. The platform pads were quickly torn up by the cats. It's quite the task to clean the bottom of the cage as well because the bottom doesn't slide out so you have to get creative when cleaning the litter.
customer_reviews.author: John Long Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy kennel.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice sturdy kennel for the three kittens we rescued. It'd be okay for a fullgrown cat or two but I wouldn't want to keep them in it all the time. There's even room for a decent size covered litter box. It wasn't too hard to put together. You just need to make sure the sides where you clip to the bottom tray are not upside down!!
customer_reviews.author: Howloh

customer_reviews.title: Purrrfect for camping kitties!
customer_reviews.text: i am very pleased with this sturdy and well designed cage. The design was flexible enough so I could assemble the lower door on one side and upper door on the opposite side. I was able to push the upper door inside the cage and attach that side directly to my camper storage access. I then added a cat flap door inside the storage area to allow them access to the inside of camper. I can access the inside of the cage now from the lower outside door. My kitties are both indoor and outdoor cats at home, but I did not feel safe bringing them camping until now.
customer_reviews.author: Bikerchic

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This was really easy to put together. The hardest part was dealing with the styrofoam. It seems really study. We didn’t use the wheels so I can’t comment on those, it’s super light weight so I don’t feel like theyre necessary and I’d rather the base be stable. I do wish it came with 3 shelves instead of 2 shelves and a hammock. It looks like most people don’t use the hammock based on pictures. It’s really small so I doubt any of our cats would use it. You can buy a third shelf.
customer_reviews.author: AFDP

customer_reviews.title: Hammocks a no-go, but otherwise pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Our cats do not love the hammocks (don't worry, the kitty in the picture is not hurt, just confused), but they love playing on the other shelves. I leave it open when I don't need them to stay put and they just go in and chill. It might have helped that I put catnip on the shelves LOL! One of the sets of vertical supports doesn't fit right so the top clip does not function like it should, but it doesn't appear to affect how sturdy the unit is. Like other reviewers, I did find it difficult to roll through the house. larger casters and a braking mechanism would really have made this better.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Quality and good size
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this cage 5 stars. it was easy to put together and seems to be quality. Decent in size, so i wont feel bad keeping the kittens in here at night. It seems like they will have plenty of space even after putting in a litter box and a wall mounted scratching post. I will update my post with more pictures as soon as i pick up all my items from the pet store.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a kitten we recently adopted. Easy to assemble and move. Need to look at the notches and curves carefully so it fits. Sees big enough for the kitten. Able to fit a regular litter box, food and water. Our cat did not like the hammock so we removed it and that made it a little more open. I like the curved edges and the removable bottom tray (some effort needed). We ordered the one with locks on the castor (or atleast thought we were) (not clear from the description) but did not receive the correct one. It rolls around when the cat is active. But overall it is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a keeper!  Fix the wheel issue!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Love the size & that it rolls. My cat loves it. Don’t care for the hammocks. Would like another shelf. Only thing i don’t like is that the wheels don’t stay under the cage. Constantly fall off. Cage is to big and heavy to keep lifting it and trying to reach under and put the wheel where it belongs. They dont stay snapped in place.
customer_reviews.author: LILLIE CASTOR

customer_reviews.title: Great cat kennel
customer_reviews.text: Saved the day when daughter and family had to stay with us while they were in between houses. It was placed in a screened-in porch and in the cold months, we secured heavy plastic (except for door) and draped quilted coverings - they were fine in GA. They were secured at night, but during the day they would go in on their own - loved the shelves. We bought extra shelves because we had 3 cats and none of them would use the hammock.
customer_reviews.author: JRSB

customer_reviews.title: great for my new kitten
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a safe place for new kitten when I'm busy or not at home. It was easy to put together by myself, but would have been faster and easier with another pair of hands. It is sturdy and well built. My kitten loves the hammocks. there is plenty of room for litter box on floor. The only downside is that the bottom does not slid out making cleaning a little harder.
customer_reviews.author: Edna Marks

customer_reviews.title: Cats 😻 them Mommy dont 😾
customer_reviews.text: Cons: WHEELS FALL OFF on hardwood floors?? (bought 3 of these) door locks wont unlock...wheels DO NOT lock as shown in pic instructions...Pros: big enough for ONE huge Catit litter box only...b/c each cat has their own playpen AND litter box...my cats 😻them... mommy dont😾...too pricey for the problems...waiting to hear back from company regarding defects and replacing items...will update
customer_reviews.author: Foxcye

customer_reviews.title: Hammock clip broke and wheels don’t have locks, otherwise it is sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The product is sturdy except one of the hammock clips broke as I was putting the cat house together. I emailed customer service and did not receive the reply yet - it has been two days. In addition, the wheels do not have locks even the manual shows as they have locks. So when the cat jumps between the shelves, the cage shakes and moves. I requested wheels with locks and again did not get a reply yet. Other than these two issues, the cat house is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bee Gu

customer_reviews.title: Using for 2 kittens
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I am pleased with this cage. I am using it for 2 8 week old kittens. I few things I've noticed: - The ledges and hammocks are a little to far away from each other for kittens. - As other reviewers noted, the final ledge interferes with the top door's ability to open fully - The instructions indicate that the wheels should have locks on them. They do NOT have locks
customer_reviews.author: MB139

customer_reviews.title: Huge!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and it’s HUGE. In hindsight, could have bought a smaller one, but it works for when I bring my cat to our vacation home where I don’t want him to roam outside. Large enough to fit a litter box, food and water and give him lots of places to lounge. He prefers the “top deck” and didn’t love the hammocks, but other cats probably would.
customer_reviews.author: Ok_artist

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This cat home is huge! My cat loves it! We are using it for our adult cat, so we ended up taking out the hammock to make room for a larger litter box. She has not problems hopping in and out and she will go and hang out in there whenever we leave the door open. The only downside is how large it is, since it does take up a significant amount of our room, but it was worth it for us to give our cat ample space!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Great concept but could be made a little sturdier for $150
customer_reviews.text: I would give this five stars because it’s pretty great, but the rollers do not stay lodged in the bottom so when you try to move it over an uneven surface they fall off. Every time. Also, one of the shelves (they have these little white plug/clamps to keep the carpet piece down) and it’s popped out like six times. Other than that, the cats love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Tillery

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I’m really happy with this pen so far! Suuuuper spacious and really easy to put together! Be prepared to invite a couple of friends over to help put it together though! And have a vacuum on hand, because you WILL get styrofoam beads EVERYWHERE when you unpack it. One of the wheels doesn’t stay in though, but I don’t plan on moving the cage around a whole lot anyways. The hammock seems kind of cheap, it’s a little thin, and if you’ve got a bigger cat (which I definitely will when my kitten is fully grown- he’s a Maine coon!) you might want to invest in something sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Wheels to dmall
customer_reviews.text: Not too bad putting together but small wheels on this size are worthless. Two came off just moving about 5 inches on a plain hard surface. Bigger rubber wheels are needed if you have to move around. The two front clamps do not match up at all / but not really needed unless you need to pick it up - which we need to since the wheels don’t work - and yes, they are unlocked. Probably give a 4+ otherwise. Kitty is getting used to it - great for her safety outside in covered, screened-in Gazebo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous cat pen. It is quite spacious & very well made. It assembled extremely easily. I bought an extra shelf to add a third perch below the highest one on the left. It worked great. I bought 2 stainless bowls that attach to the bars & put them at the level of that lowest shelf. Everything is so perfect. Now my kitty is safe with plenty of space to chill when I have to go away. She loves to chew on items that she shouldn’t & destroy things when not supervised. So this is the perfect solution for her. I highly recommend this pen.
customer_reviews.author: ZomBettie

customer_reviews.title: Alignment critical!
customer_reviews.text: Quality manufactured components. Critically important to follow directions & align top to bottom. Expect problems with clips if not properly aligned. Make sure sliders are properly aligned to the wire of the adjoining panels. Fairly easy assembly. The only negative is the Styrofoam packing material pieces end up everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: George H. Haag

customer_reviews.title: Purrfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this due to my cat being ill and peeing inappropriately. She spent a lot of time in her for several weeks. She was fine with it. Plenty of room for a litter box & food/water. After she was feeling better, I had her out sitting with me on the sofa & she got up and went back in. Apparently she liked her new apartment. Would highly recommend. Super easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Deeann P.

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had ramps
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 16 year old cat who’s started to urinate outside the litter box and needed to be contained when I wasn’t able to supervise her. Mostly it has worked well. She won’t use the hammocks but I think that is just her, not the product. I do like the three levels because it gives her a separate area for litter, food, and sleeping. I do wish it had ramps because she has gotten more arthritic this past year and I’ve noticed she is starting to have difficulty jumping from level to level. It was easy to assemble. I wouldn’t bother with the casters it came with; the locks prevent it from rolling properly.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Cats like it.
customer_reviews.text: One piece was broken when this arrived, had to put it together anyway because I was going out of town. Still waiting to hear from manufacturer. Cats seem to like it. Had a Midwest in the past that I left on the porch and it rusted out. I thought I would try this one because it got better reviews than Midwest. The cats seem to like it. I rescue and foster cats and have to keep some separate. Update-Oct. 30, 2016. o answer from manufacturer regarding broken piece. Update-6 months later-never heard from manufacturer, product still broken.
customer_reviews.author: Captainred60

customer_reviews.title: Deluxe Cat Home is RIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: My Granddaughter got a kitten for her recent birthday. This is a little more expensive than some of the others, but when you see how well it is built and all the features it has versus the others, that $30 or $40 extra is trivial. This should last as long as they want it to. It looks nice in bedroom, too. I was told the kitten likes sleeping in the hammock. This is a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Davio

customer_reviews.title: A safe haven.
customer_reviews.text: My cat is elderly and has issues with incontinence, etc. This space provides a safe and secure haven for my cat. He wears diapers during the day and needs a place to air out and relax diaper free. It is easy to access and is well made. I am thankful for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Judy D

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough to assemble
customer_reviews.text: First picture above is side view, second is frontal. I didn’t time it but I would say it took me about an hour to assemble it. Follow instructions.... Even though it feels sturdy it still wobbles/rattles a bit when my cat is jumping up and down in it. I only purchased it as a backup recovery room so my cats don’t actually use it on the daily basis. The hammocks are hilarious!
customer_reviews.author: Icicle4

customer_reviews.title: This was so super easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This was so super easy to put together, it is sturdy but will not really keep more than 1-2 large American cats happy. Really for my fatso's 1 cat would be ideal. 1st day she knocked the litter box over 3 times. It was easy to vacuum the floor area but not the groove where the cage sides are in the track. I recommend a heavy litter and a medium to large litter box. I like that I can roll it out of the way when not in use or cleaning it. And then set the wheels so that it doesn't go anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Nice big roomy cat cage!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cat cage. However, people are right when you open the box to assemble it there's lots of Styrofoam. So have your Shop-Vac ready to go for easy cleanup! The wheels do not stay on And with the kitty litter box in the cage, it makes it heavier. I didn't have any problems getting it together, overall I plan to get a 2nd cage.
customer_reviews.author: prime member

customer_reviews.title: Wheels fall off and ruin floor
customer_reviews.text: The wheels on the bottom do not stay on when your moving it making the whole thing fall over! Also, the locks on the wheels actually touch the ground when attempting to move which scratched my wood floors! The bottom of this cage is a terrible design!
customer_reviews.author: JenlakeM

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves being outdoors
customer_reviews.text: This cage allows my cat a chance to be outside again. He used to be able to come and go on his own but we’re in a new place and I don’t know how he would do here. He is really happy to be able to sit on the shelves and look around. He will not use the hammocks so I got a 3rd shelf ‘and placed it on the opposite side so he can stair-step from the bottom to the top. This shelf blocks half of the middle door but it’s not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Island Gal

customer_reviews.title: Cats can play- keeps Poodle away!
customer_reviews.text: Obviously If you view my pic- it is clear why I needed this- I call it a jungle gym for my kitties until they and the poodle get used to each other. It was a very easy set up. Did it myself without any issues or tools. It’s well made. Large enough for a litter box. I bought the Delux version and it’s plenty big for my kitties. I also bought an extra hammock as I think they will both enjoy those. The wheels are great and roll easily. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Beth

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I am that "Nana's House" where everyone congregates and at times my cat just wants to be in a "safe zone". Also, there are times when my house is busting at the seams with family and love and out comes the blow up mattresses. He loves the cage and will go in unforced when he needs his "safe zone". I don't feel bad if he has to be locked up for the night because he has all of his necessaries with him. Great investment!
customer_reviews.author: Gantt33

customer_reviews.title: They love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy! It’s a great way to keep my kittens safe when in different parts of the house and introducing them to the other animals in the house. I also bought the Dimaka 29”tall cat scratching post to put in the middle for them to get up to the different levels and get down. It’s perfect! Very easy to move from one room to the next...very sturdy, but not too heavy. Highly recommended, especially the tallest version of this condo!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: We love it!! My cats go in and out all the time. I leave the doors open and my cats will just go in there and Lay down. One will only lay on the hammocks and the other on the shelves it works Out perfect. I can close them up when we leave, my cats Like To explore a lot I’ve come Home to broken vases or Knick knacks knocked over. I keep the bottom Door shut all the time, it keeps dogs Out of kitty litter and the cats food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Awesome Condo
customer_reviews.text: This cage arrived ahead of schedule which is always a good thing. This was very easy to put together. As a 67 year-old female, I had no issues putting this together by myself. The casters make it very easy to move. My only 2 issues are 1) I thought the casters were supposed to lock and 2) the styrofoam packaging; we had to take the box outside to unpack the pieces to avoid broken styrofoam and styrofoam pieces from getting all over the house. Bottom line: totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce E. Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: Worth it 100%! Keeps my kitty safe and out of trouble when I am gone.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a new kitten. She loves it. This is her home when I am at work or whenever she wants to go in it. 2 people to assemble is probably best, but could be done with 1. The hardest decision is where to put the shelves. I ended up just following the picture. Be warned, you will be compelled to buy all the accessories too. LOL I added a little litter box, food dishes and scratching post. Everything attaches to the cage to keep kitty safe. She is one spoiled kitty!
customer_reviews.author: Roxan

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I adopted a new kitten last week and needed something to keep him safe while i’m at work. This is perfect for that! I like that it has an upper and lower door so I can access all parts of the cage. Assembly took less than an hour by myself. When he’s big enough to safely venture out on his own, I think this would make a good catio alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Very well built
customer_reviews.text: This was great to have as we were introducing our new kittens to their furever home! I was really impressed with how easily everything went together (would have been even easier if I had really paid attention to the diagrams) and the main selling point is that there weren't any pinch points! There's another cage on Amazon that's cheaper but if you read the reviews you'll see that there's a risk of kittens getting their paws hung in the pinch points and ending up getting part of their limb amputated. I freaked when I read that and immediately grabbed this one! The cost is well worth the safety considerations and it really is a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: C. Stahl

product_meta.title: Prevue Pet Products Premium/Deluxe Cat Home, Black
product_meta.description: Style:PremiumPrevue Pet Products premium cat home with 4 levels 7500 is a safe haven for your cats to play and rest. An extra large home Designed for housing several cats or kittens, exceptional engineering makes our cat cage easy to assemble and provides a paw friendly design – No gaps or pinch points! Lightweight, rust-resistant, metal components construction is heavy duty with rails, clips and alignment tabs to keep cage parts aligned, strong and sturdy. A single piece unit-base provides a strong and stable foundation for the entire cat home while metal and hard rubber casters allow you to easily move the cage. Pet parents can comfortably access The cage interior through any one of the three large front doors; each door opening measures 18 ¼’’ long and 17 5/8’’ high. Cage doors open easily and securely with our simple two-finger locking mechanism. 2 super soft plush hammocks, each measuring 20’’ long and 15’’ wide PLUS 2 platforms with removable felt covers, each measuring 22 ¼’’ long and 13 7/8’’ wide, are included for your cat’s sleeping and lounging pleasure. All hammocks and platform pads are machine washable. A contemporary Black matte finish complements your décor and is easy to clean while the large base provides space to include toys, scratching posts or a litter box if desired. Taller and wider than other cages on the market to provide your cats with more living space, Our premium cat home 7500 has 4 levels with 1’’ wire spacing and measures 43 ¼’’ long, 25 1/4’’ wide and 65 ¾’’ high – over 5 feet tall!
feature_bullets: Paw friendly design - No gaps or pinch points
Two extra large hammocks and two lock-in platforms included
Exceptional engineering makes this cat cage easy to assemble
43 1/4" Long, 25 1/4" Wide, 65 3/4" High - over 5 feet tall!

Cleaning - wash cage regularly with a mild soap and warm water. Dry thoroughly. Do not dry tray in the sun, as it can warp. For platform liners - remove the fastening plugs and place items in a bag for delicates. Machine wash warm, dry on low/cool or Air dry. Do not iron or use bleach, fabric softeners and strongly scented soaps. Do not wash the corner-fastening plugs

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
